projects.title: FoodLabs
projects.description: Discover, create, and explore recipes like never before with our intelligent recipe application. Users can generate personalized recipes by simply describing what they want—our AI instantly crafts detailed, step-by-step instructions. The app also features AI-enhanced search, allowing users to find recipes more accurately through natural language queries, dietary preferences, available ingredients, or desired cuisine. Whether you're an experienced chef or a home cook, our app brings creativity and convenience to your kitchen.

projects.title: FoodLabs API
projects.description: The FoodLabs API empowers developers with advanced AI-driven features for modern recipe applications. It offers intelligent recipe generation, allowing users to create custom recipes based on natural language prompts. The API also includes AI-enhanced search, enabling flexible, accurate querying by ingredients, cuisine, dietary preferences, and more. Built-in pagination support ensures efficient data handling and smooth user experiences across large recipe datasets. Ideal for apps that prioritize personalization, discovery, and performance.

projects.title: CV
projects.description: CV Web Application, a dynamic and visually engaging way to explore my professional journey, skills, and accomplishments. This web app is more than just a traditional resume—it's a personalized platform designed to provide a comprehensive and interactive overview of who I am and what I bring to the table.

projects.title: IceBreaker
projects.description: The IceBreaker is an innovative Arduino-based device designed to help people overcome social anxiety and foster meaningful conversations. Perfect for group settings, this device randomly selects a common topic or question, encouraging participants to take turns speaking and sharing their thoughts. Whether you're at a networking event, team-building activity, or just hanging out with friends, The IceBreaker creates a comfortable and inclusive environment for everyone to engage.

projects.title: English for Kids
projects.description: English for Kids is a fun and interactive web app designed to help young learners build their English vocabulary while leveraging their native Georgian language. Perfect for children and beginners, this app provides a simple and engaging way to learn essential English words through visual aids, audio pronunciations, and bilingual support.

projects.title: Virtual Keyboard
projects.description: Virtual Keyboard, a versatile and user-friendly web app that brings the convenience of a keyboard to your screen. Whether you're using a touchscreen device, a kiosk, or just prefer an on-screen typing experience, this virtual keyboard is designed to meet your needs with ease and efficiency. With support for both English and Georgian languages, it's the perfect tool for bilingual typing!

projects.title: Breakout
projects.description: Breakout, a modern twist on the timeless arcade classic! Breakout has been adapted for the web, offering the same addictive gameplay you know and love, with a fresh and user-friendly experience. Whether you're a nostalgic gamer or new to the world of Breakout, this web app is your go-to destination for fun and challenge.

projects.title: Luka's Quizzes
projects.description: Luka's Quizzes, the ultimate platform for quiz enthusiasts! Whether you're a trivia lover, a teacher, or just someone who enjoys challenging yourself and others, this website offers a fun and interactive way to create, play, and track quizzes. With a focus on simplicity and engagement, Luka's Quizzes makes learning and competing enjoyable for everyone.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: The Calculator , a simple yet powerful online tool designed to make your everyday calculations effortless. Whether you're a student, professional, or just someone who needs quick math solutions, this website is here to help you solve problems with ease and precision.

experiences.title: Angular Software Engineer
experiences.description:
Collaborated with diverse teams across multiple projects, gaining extensive experience in teamwork and cross-functional communication.
Contributed to project development through unit testing, bug fixes, and feature enhancements, ensuring high-quality code and application performance.
Acquired proficiency in LightningJS, a specialized library for TV app development, by independently learning and applying it to deliver robust and innovative solutions.
Demonstrated adaptability by quickly mastering new technologies and methodologies to meet project requirements and deadlines.

experiences.title: Laravel/Vue.js Intern
experiences.description:
During this internship, I gained hands-on experience in full-stack development using PHP/Laravel for backend development and Vue.js for frontend development.
I contributed to two key projects:
1. The first project utilized Laravel Blade Templates for the frontend, PHP/Laravel for the backend, and an SQL database.
2. The second project involved building a dynamic frontend with Vue.js, while leveraging PHP/Laravel for backend functionality and an SQL database for data management.
Through these projects, I strengthened my skills in both frontend and backend development, as well as database integration.

experiences.title: Java Trainee
experiences.description:
Skills Developed:
Deeper understanding of OOP, Design Pattern and coding principles (e.g. SOLID, KISS)
Test Driven Development and technologies used for Java Testing (e.g. JUnit, Mockito)
Maven Build Tool
Multithreading and Concurrency; JVM Memory Management
Working with SQL databases in Java (JDBC)
Spring Core; Spring MVC; Spring Core
